type.name: action_approval_item
type.description: A action_approval_item extends approval assignment to action instances.

type.name: action_contract_item
type.description: An action_contract_item extends contract assignment to action instances.

type.name: action_date_and_time_item
type.description: A action_date_and_time_item extends date and time assignment to action instances.

type.name: action_date_item
type.description: A action_date_item extends date assignment to action instances.

type.name: action_item
type.description: An extensible slect identifying the elements of product data that can be affected by an action.

type.name: action_organization_item
type.description: An action_organization_item extends organization assignment to action instances.

type.name: action_person_and_organization_item
type.description: A action_person_and_organization_item extends person and organization assignment to action instances.

entity.name: applied_action_assignment
entity.description: The applied_action_assignment entity relates an action to the elements of product data that are affected by the action.

explicit.name: items
explicit.description: The elements of product data that are affected by the action.
